document_data.name: Galath's Roost
document_data.mainbody: '''Galath's Roost''' was a fortress located in [[Mistledale]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Galath's Roost was located in the eastern region of Mistledale.
document_data.History: The fortress was occupied by its namesakeâ€“a bandit captain named [[Galath]] during the 10{{th}} century DR who used the keep as a base to launch raids throughout Mistledale and even [[Sembia]]. A large band of Sembian soldiers eventually retaliated and killed everyone within the keep.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Galath's [[ghost]] was rumored to haunt his fortress long after his death.
